TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class OdbcDataAdapter : System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter, ICloneable

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OdbcDataAdapter extends System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter implements class System.Data.IDataAdapter, class System.Data.IDbDataAdapter, class System.ICloneable
Public NotInheritable Class OdbcDataAdapter Inherits DbDataAdapter Implements ICloneable
public ref class OdbcDataAdapter sealed : System::Data::Common::DbDataAdapter, ICloneable

summary.span: 表示数据命令集和到数据源的连接，它们用于填充 以及更新该数据源。

span.span: Represents a set of data commands and a connection to a data source that are used to fill the and update the data source.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用作之间的桥梁`DataSet`和用于检索和保存数据的数据源。The serves as a bridge between a `DataSet` and data source for retrieving and saving data. 通过使用提供此桥将数据从数据源到，并使用发送中所做更改回数据源。The provides this bridge by using to load data from the data source into the , and using to send changes made in the back to the data source. 当填充，如果不存在创建所需的表和列返回的数据。When the fills a , it creates the required tables and columns for the returned data if they do not already exist. 但是，主键信息不包含在隐式创建的架构除非属性设置为。However, primary key information is not included in the implicitly created schema unless the property is set to . 你可能还有创建的架构，包括主键信息、 使用数据填充它之前。You may also have the create the schema of the , including primary key information, before filling it with data using . 有关详细信息，请参阅[将现有约束添加到数据集](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset.md)。For more information, see [Adding Existing Constraints to a DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset.md). > [!NOTE] > 当调用`Fill`方法不具有主键列，对数据源尝试将提升为主键的唯一约束列。When you call the `Fill` method on a data source that does not have a primary key column, the tries to promote the unique constraint column to the primary key. 在过程中，将标记为不可为 null 的唯一约束。In the process, the marks the unique constraint as not nullable. 此行为适用，除非存在位于唯一约束列中 null 值。This behavior works unless there is a null value in the unique constraint column. 如果没有一个 null 值，`Fill`方法将失败并违反了约束。If there is a null value, the `Fill` method fails with a constraint violation. 若要避免这种情况下，唯一约束列中不允许使用 null 值。To avoid this situation, do not allow null values in the unique constraint column. > [!NOTE] > 由于本机 ODBC 驱动程序，只有一个限制在调用时返回。Due to the limitations of native ODBC drivers, only one is ever returned when you call . 这是 true，即使从多个执行 SQL 批处理语句正常的对象。This is true even when executing SQL batch statements from which multiple objects would be expected. 还包括， ， ， ，和`TableMappings`属性以便于加载和更新的数据。The also includes the , , , , and `TableMappings` properties to facilitate loading and updating of data. ## Examples 下面的示例使用， ，和选择记录并填充`DataSet`与所选的行。The following example uses , , and to select records and populate a `DataSet` with the selected rows. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你创建的实例，以下的只写和只读属性被设置为其默认值，如表所示。When you create an instance of , the following write-only and read-only properties are set to their default values, as shown in the table. |属性Properties|默认值Default value| |----------------|-------------------| ||`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| ||`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| 你可以更改任何通过单独属性调用这些属性的值。You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其属性的一些。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.OdbcDataAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.OdbcDataAdapter/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.OdbcDataAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.OdbcDataAdapter/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现的构造函数集属性中指定的值`selectCommand`参数。This implementation of the constructor sets the property to the value specified in the `selectCommand` parameter. 当你创建的实例，以下的只写和只读属性被设置为其默认值，如表所示。When you create an instance of , the following write-only and read-only properties are set to their default values, as shown in the table. |属性Properties|初始值Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| ||`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| ||`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| 你可以更改任何通过单独属性调用这些属性的值。You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其属性的一些。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载构造函数使用`selectConnectionString`参数设置属性。This overload of the constructor uses the `selectConnectionString` parameter to set the property. 但是，它不开放连接。However, it does not open the connection. 你仍必须显式打开连接。You still must explicitly open the connection. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其属性的一些。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. summary.span: 获取或设置 SQL 语句或存储过程，用于删除数据源中的记录。

span.span: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to delete records in the data source.

value.span: 在更新操作期间使用的 ，它用来删除数据源中与 中已删除的行相对应的记录。

span.span: An used during an update operation to delete records in the data source that correspond to deleted rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性分配给以前创建、不克隆。When the property is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 相反，保留以前创建的引用。Instead, the maintains a reference to the previously created . 更新操作期间，如果不是组和主键信息位于，可以使用类自动生成，和对帐所需的其他命令到数据源。During an update operation, if is not set and primary key information is present in the , you can use the class to automatically generate the , and additional commands needed to reconcile the to the data source. 若要执行此操作，将设置属性。To do this, set the property of the . 生成逻辑也需要要中存在的键列信息。The generation logic also requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建和设置和属性。The following example creates an and sets the and properties. 它假定你已创建对象。It assumes that you have already created an object. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: An used during an update operation to insert records in the data source that correspond to new rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性分配给以前创建对象，不克隆。When the property is assigned to a previously created object, the is not cloned. 相反，保留以前创建的引用。Instead, maintains a reference to the previously created . 更新操作期间，如果不是组和主键信息位于，可以使用类自动生成，和对帐所需的其他命令到数据源。During an update operation, if is not set and primary key information is present in the , you can use the class to automatically generate , and additional commands needed to reconcile the to the data source. 若要执行此操作，将设置属性。To do this, set the property of the . 生成逻辑也需要要中存在的键列信息。The generation logic also requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果执行此命令返回行，这些行可能添加到取决于你如何设置属性对象。If execution of this command returns rows, these rows may be added to the depending upon how you set the property of the object. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和设置和属性。The following example creates an and sets the and properties. 它假定你已创建对象。It assumes that you have already created an object. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Custom Event RowUpdated As OdbcRowUpdatedEventHandler

summary.span: 在针对数据源执行命令之后的更新操作期间发生。

span.span: Occurs during an update operation after a command is executed against the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你使用，有两个事件发生每个更新的数据行。When you use , there are two events that occur per data row updated. 执行顺序如下所示：The order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值移动到的参数值。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 3. 该命令执行。The command executes. 4. 如果该命令设置为`FirstReturnedRecord`，第一个返回结果将放置在。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the . 5. 如果没有输出参数，它们都将置于。If there are output parameters, they are placed in the . 6. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 7. 调用 。 is called.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RowUpdating As OdbcRowUpdatingEventHandler

summary.span: 在对数据源执行命令前的 过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during before a command is executed against the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你使用，有两个事件发生每个更新的数据行。When you use , there are two events that occur per data row updated. 执行顺序如下所示：The order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值移动到的参数值。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 3. 该命令执行。The command executes. 4. 如果该命令设置为`FirstReturnedRecord`，第一个返回结果将放置在。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the . 5. 如果没有输出参数，它们都将置于。If there are output parameters, they are placed in the . 6. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 7. 调用 。 is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当分配到以前创建、不克隆。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 相反，保留以前创建的引用对象。Instead, the maintains a reference to the previously created object. 如果不返回任何行，没有表将添加到，并且不引发任何异常。If returns no rows, no tables are added to the , and no exception is raised. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和设置和属性。The following example creates an and sets the and properties. 它假定你已创建对象。It assumes that you have already created an object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当分配到以前创建、不克隆。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 相反，保留以前创建的引用对象。Instead, the maintains a reference to the previously created object. 更新操作期间，如果不是组和主键信息位于，可以使用类自动生成，和对帐所需的其他命令到数据源。During an update operation, if is not set and primary key information is present in the , you can use the class to automatically generate , and additional commands needed to reconcile the to the data source. 若要执行此操作，将设置属性。To do this, set the property of the . 生成逻辑也需要要中存在的键列信息。The generation logic also requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果执行此命令返回行，这些行可能会与合并取决于你如何设置属性对象。If execution of this command returns rows, these rows may be merged with the depending upon how you set the property of the object. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和设置和属性。The following example creates an and sets the and properties. 它假定你已创建对象。It assumes that you have already created an object. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand/VB/source.vb#1)]
